pages.text: $(marked)Lilith$(), the Mountain-Mother of $(l:bewitchment:creatures/vampire)Vampires$() is often addressed to grant victims of $(l:bewitchment:curses/vampirism)$(marked)Vampirism$() higher powers.$(br)Pledging to her allows them to freely change their form into that of a $(marked)Bat$(), allowing them to roam freely.$(br2)Alternatively, she can be given be offered $(l:bewitchment:introduction/crops)$(item)Garlic$(), freeing the victim of her curse.

pages.title: Summoning Lilith
pages.text: Summoning Lilith works much like summoning $(l:bewitchment:creatures/herne)$(marked)Herne$(). It requires you to be in a $(marked)mountains$() biome.$(br)Prepare a $(l:bewitchment:tools/incense#mortal_coil)$(marked)Mortal Coil Incense$() and slay a $(marked)Chicken$() with an $(l:bewitchment:tools/athame)$(item)Athame$() at night.

You want to keep Lilith around if you want to pledge to her, so decide where to summon her wisely.$(br)Alternatively, you can attempt moving her using the $(l:bewitchment:rituals/warp)$(marked)Warp$() ritual.$(br2)$(o)Once pledged, you can toggle your Bat-form by pressing [$(k:bewitchment.transformation_ability)].$()
